io.requery.sql

Interface Configuration


  • public interface Configuration
    Defines the configuration settings for the EntityDataStore.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int batchUpdateSize() 
      ConnectionProvider connectionProvider() 
      EntityCache entityCache() 
      EntityModel entityModel() 
      Mapping mapping() 
      Platform platform() 
      boolean quoteColumnNames() 
      boolean quoteTableNames() 
      int statementCacheSize() 
      Set<StatementListener> statementListeners() 
      TransactionIsolation transactionIsolation() 
      Set<Supplier<TransactionListener>> transactionListenerFactories() 
      TransactionMode transactionMode() 
      boolean useDefaultLogging() 
      Executor writeExecutor() 

    • Method Detail

      • connectionProvider

        ConnectionProvider connectionProvider()
        Returns:
        Connection provider. This provider must return a usable connection.

      • platform

        Platform platform()
        Returns:
        Platform to use, if null the Platform will try to be determined automatically via the Connection metadata.

      • entityModel

        EntityModel entityModel()
        Returns:
        EntityModel defining the model, must not be null.

      • entityCache

        EntityCache entityCache()
        Returns:
        EntityCache cache to use (if null no caching will be used)

      • mapping

        Mapping mapping()
        Returns:
        the mapping implementation use (if null default mapping will be used)

      • writeExecutor

        Executor writeExecutor()
        Returns:
        for asynchronous operations the Executor that is used to perform the write.

      • useDefaultLogging

        boolean useDefaultLogging()
        Returns:
        true if the default logging should be enabled

      • quoteTableNames

        boolean quoteTableNames()
        Returns:
        true if the all the table names should be quoted.

      • quoteColumnNames

        boolean quoteColumnNames()
        Returns:
        true if all column names should be quoted.

      • statementCacheSize

        int statementCacheSize()
        Returns:
        number of statements to cache, 0 to disable caching.

      • batchUpdateSize

        int batchUpdateSize()
        Returns:
        max number of statements to use in a batch insert or update operation.

      • transactionMode

        TransactionMode transactionMode()
        Returns:
        the mode of transactions enabled TransactionMode, defaults to TransactionMode.AUTO

      • transactionIsolation

        TransactionIsolation transactionIsolation()
        Returns:
        optional default TransactionIsolation isolation to use for transactions.

      • transactionListenerFactories

        Set<Supplier<TransactionListener>> transactionListenerFactories()
        Returns:
        get the supplier of transaction listeners. One TransactionListener will be requested per Transaction

      • statementListeners

        Set<StatementListener> statementListeners()
        Returns:
        get the set of default statement listeners
